welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nonthaburi, a charming city known for its rich culture and beautiful landmarks. Get ready to immerse yourself in the local way of life and discover all that this vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session.
